thread.title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping

title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping
text:
Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 01:22 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un pledges to denuclearize and meet U.S. officials at an historic meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, at Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since assuming power in 2011. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un pledges to denuclearize and meet U.S. officials at an historic meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, at Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since assuming power in 2011.
